item.title: Multidimensional Arrays in C#
item.description: What Are Multidimensional Arrays? A multidimensional array is an array of arrays. This means it will have multiple levels. This is also commonly called a matrix or table. In this article, we will be going over how to implement a simple 2D array in C# and some other options for taking this technique a bit further! 2D Arrays Here are 3 standard arrays of strings: string[] fruit = {"apple", "banana", "peach"} string[] vegetable = {"peas", "kale", "carrot"} string[] meat = {"chicken", "beef", "lamb"} Now, what if we wanted to combine these foods into one large array?
